Key Match Events: Virat Kohli was dropped on 12 by Mitchell Marsh off Josh Hazlewood
Virat Kohli made 85 as he masterminded yet another successful chase for India
KL Rahul produced a chanceless knock of 97 not out
Ravindra Jadeja and Kuldeep Yadav shared five wickets to wreck the Australian innings
India's spin strategy had an impact with the introduction of Ravichandran Ashwin in the eighth over
Kuldeep Yadav returned to bowl Maxwell in the 36th over
Mitchell Starc scored 28 off 35 balls with two fours and a six
Post-Match Reflections: India's captain, Rohit Sharma, praised Kohli and Rahul as well as India's bowlers
Australia captain, Cummins, was left to rue the drop of Kohli early in the chase
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a spin-friendly surface
India's spinners, Ravindra Jadeja and Kuldeep Yadav, were instrumental in restricting Australia to a low total
The Australian tail stuck around to add vital runs with the last three wickets adding 59
Others: Ishan Kishan was out caught at slip off Mitchell Starc for a golden duck
Rohit Sharma was out LBW to Josh Hazlewood
Shreyas Iyer made it three ducks among the top four Indian batters
